Jan 31 (Reuters) - Gilead Sciences Inc said on Friday it provided its experimental Ebola therapy for use in a small number of patients with the Wuhan coronavirus and is working with China's health authorities to set up a trial to test the drug against the virus.
The company said it was also expediting laboratory testing of the antiviral drug, remdesivir, against samples of the new coronavirus.
